00017 LightCollector::LightCollector(const LightCollector &lc)
00018 {
00019         if (lc.vertices) vertices = cvCloneMat(lc.vertices);
00020         else vertices=0;
00021         if (lc.transformed) transformed = cvCloneMat(lc.transformed);
00022         else transformed=0;
00023         nbTri = lc.nbTri;
00024         nx = lc.nx;
00025         ny = lc.ny;
00026         if (lc.triangles) {
00027                 triangles = new int[nbTri*3];
00028                 memcpy(triangles, lc.triangles, sizeof(int)*nbTri*3);
00029         } else triangles=0;
00030         avgChannels = lc.avgChannels;
00031         avg=0;
00032         if (lc.worldRT) cvIncRefData(lc.worldRT);
00033         worldRT = lc.worldRT;
00034         //assert(lc.avg==0);
00035 }

00054 void LightCollector::copy(const LightCollector &lc)
00055 {
00056         if (lc.vertices) vertices = cvCloneMat(lc.vertices);
00057         else vertices=0;
00058         if (lc.transformed) transformed = cvCloneMat(lc.transformed);
00059         else transformed=0;
00060         nbTri = lc.nbTri;
00061         nx = lc.nx;
00062         ny = lc.ny;
00063         avgChannels = lc.avgChannels;
00064         if (lc.triangles) {
00065                 triangles = new int[nbTri*3];
00066                 memcpy(triangles, lc.triangles, sizeof(int)*nbTri*3);
00067         } else 
00068                 triangles=0;
00069         if (lc.avg) {
00070                 avg = new float[avgChannels*nbTri];
00071                 memcpy(avg, lc.avg, sizeof(float)*avgChannels*nbTri);
00072         } else 
00073                 avg=0;
00074         if (lc.worldRT) worldRT=cvCloneMat(lc.worldRT);
00075         else worldRT = 0;
00076 }

00078 LightCollector::~LightCollector() {
00079         if (avg) delete[] avg;
00080         if (vertices) cvReleaseMat(&vertices);
00081         if (transformed) cvReleaseMat(&transformed);
00082         if (worldRT) cvDecRefData(&worldRT);

00091 void LightCollector::averageImage(IplImage *im, CvMat *_homography)
00092 {
00093         if (avgChannels != im->nChannels) {
00094                 if (avgChannels < im->nChannels) { 
00095                         delete[] avg;
00096                         avg = 0;
00097                 }
00098                 avgChannels = im->nChannels;
00099         }
00100         if (!avg) avg = new float[avgChannels*nbTri];
00101         
00102         // apply the homography to every mesh vertex
00103         if (_homography)
00104                 cvMatMul(_homography, vertices, transformed);
00105         else
00106                 cvCopy(vertices, transformed);
00107         CvMat r1,r2,r3;
00108         cvGetRow(transformed, &r1, 0);
00109         cvGetRow(transformed, &r2, 1);
00110         cvGetRow(transformed, &r3, 2);
00111         cvDiv(&r1,&r3,&r1);
00112         cvDiv(&r2,&r3,&r2);
00113         
00114         nbPix=0;
00115         for (int t=0; t<nbTri;t++) {
00116                 int pts[3][2];
00117                 for (int i=0; i<3; i++) {
00118                         assert(triangles[t*3+i] < transformed->cols);
00119                         pts[i][0] = cvRound(CV_MAT_ELEM(*transformed, float, 0, triangles[t*3+i]));
00120                         pts[i][1] = cvRound(CV_MAT_ELEM(*transformed, float, 1, triangles[t*3+i]));
00121                 }
00122                 nbPix+=stat_triangle(im, pts, avg+t*avgChannels);
00123         }
00124 }
00125 
00126 bool LightCollector::genGrid(float corners[4][2], int nx, int ny)
00127 {
00128         if (nx<1 || ny<1) return false;
00129         if (avg) delete[] avg; avg=0;
00130         if (vertices) cvReleaseMat(&vertices);
00131         if (transformed) cvReleaseMat(&transformed);
00132 
00133         // generate vertices
00134         vertices = cvCreateMat(3, (nx+1)*(ny+1), CV_32FC1);
00135         transformed = cvCreateMat(3, vertices->cols, CV_32FC1);
00136         for (int y=0; y<(ny+1); ++y)
00137                 for (int x=0; x<(nx+1); ++x) {
00138                         CV_MAT_ELEM(*vertices, float, 0, y*(nx+1)+x) = float(x)/float(nx);
00139                         CV_MAT_ELEM(*vertices, float, 1, y*(nx+1)+x) = float(y)/float(ny);
00140                         CV_MAT_ELEM(*vertices, float, 2, y*(nx+1)+x) = 1;
00141                 }
00142 
00143         // generate triangles
00144         nbTri = nx*ny*2;
00145         triangles = new int[nbTri*3];
00146         int *tri = triangles;
00147         for (int y=0; y<ny; ++y)
00148                 for (int x=0; x<nx; ++x) {
00149                         tri[0] = y*(nx+1)+x;
00150                         tri[1] = y*(nx+1)+x+1;
00151                         tri[2] = (y+1)*(nx+1)+x;
00152                         tri+=3;
00153                         tri[0] = y*(nx+1)+x+1;
00154                         tri[1] = (y+1)*(nx+1)+x+1;
00155                         tri[2] = (y+1)*(nx+1)+x;
00156                         tri+=3;
00157                 }
00158 
00159         homography H;
00160         if (!H.estimate(0, 0, corners[0][0], corners[0][1],
00161                                 1, 0, corners[1][0], corners[1][1],
00162                                 1, 1, corners[2][0], corners[2][1],
00163                                 0, 1, corners[3][0], corners[3][1]))
00164                 return false;
00165 
00166         cvMatMul(&H, vertices, transformed);
00167         CvMat r1,r2,r3, d1, d2;
00168         cvGetRow(transformed, &r1, 0);
00169         cvGetRow(transformed, &r2, 1);
00170         cvGetRow(transformed, &r3, 2);
00171         cvGetRow(vertices, &d1, 0);
00172         cvGetRow(vertices, &d2, 1);
00173         cvDiv(&r1,&r3,&d1);
00174         cvDiv(&r2,&r3,&d2);
00175         return true;
00176 }
00177 
00178 void LightCollector::drawGrid(IplImage *im, CvMat *_homography)
00179 {
00180         // apply the homography to every mesh vertex
00181         cvMatMul(_homography, vertices, transformed);
00182         CvMat r1,r2,r3;
00183         cvGetRow(transformed, &r1, 0);
00184         cvGetRow(transformed, &r2, 1);
00185         cvGetRow(transformed, &r3, 2);
00186         cvDiv(&r1,&r3,&r1);
00187         cvDiv(&r2,&r3,&r2);
00188         
00189         for (int t=0; t<nbTri;t++) {
00190                 int pts[3][2];
00191                 for (int i=0; i<3; i++) {
00192                         pts[i][0] = cvRound(CV_MAT_ELEM(*transformed, float, 0, triangles[t*3+i]));
00193                         pts[i][1] = cvRound(CV_MAT_ELEM(*transformed, float, 1, triangles[t*3+i]));
00194                 }
00195                 cvLine(im, cvPoint(pts[0][0], pts[0][1]), cvPoint(pts[1][0], pts[1][1]), cvScalarAll(255), 1,4,0);
00196                 cvLine(im, cvPoint(pts[1][0], pts[1][1]), cvPoint(pts[2][0], pts[2][1]), cvScalarAll(255), 1,4,0);
00197                 cvLine(im, cvPoint(pts[2][0], pts[2][1]), cvPoint(pts[0][0], pts[0][1]), cvScalarAll(255), 1,4,0);
00198         }
00199 }
00200 
00201 void LightCollector::drawAvg(IplImage *im)
00202 {
00203         for (int t=0; t<nbTri;t++) {
00204                 CvPoint pts[3];
00205                 for (int i=0; i<3; i++) {
00206                         pts[i].x = cvRound(CV_MAT_ELEM(*transformed, float, 0, triangles[t*3+i]));
00207                         pts[i].y = cvRound(CV_MAT_ELEM(*transformed, float, 1, triangles[t*3+i]));
00208                 }
00209                 CvScalar col;
00210                 if (avgChannels >1) {
00211                         float *c = avg + avgChannels*t;
00212                         col = CV_RGB(c[0], c[1], c[2]);
00213                 } else {
00214                         col = cvScalarAll(avg[t]);
00215                 }
00216                 cvFillConvexPoly(im, pts, 3, col);
00217         }
00218 }

00220 struct Hdr {
00221         int nx,ny,nbTri,avgChannels,nbPix;
00222 };
00223 int LightCollector::serializeSize()
00224 {
00225         return sizeof(Hdr)+nbTri*avgChannels*sizeof(float);
00226 }
00227 
00228 void LightCollector::serialize(char *buffer) 
00229 {
00230         Hdr *hdr = (Hdr *) buffer;
00231         hdr->nx = nx;
00232         hdr->ny = ny;
00233         hdr->nbTri = nbTri;
00234         hdr->avgChannels = avgChannels;
00235         hdr->nbPix = nbPix;
00236         assert(nbTri!=0 && avgChannels!=0);
00237         memcpy(buffer + sizeof(Hdr), avg, nbTri*avgChannels*sizeof(float));
00238 }
00239 
00240 void LightCollector::load(const char *buffer, int size)
00241 {
00242         const Hdr *hdr = (const Hdr *) buffer;
00243         //assert(nx == hdr->nx);
00244         //assert(ny == hdr->ny);
00245         nx = hdr->nx;
00246         ny = hdr->ny;
00247         nbTri = hdr->nbTri;
00248         if (avg && avgChannels < hdr->avgChannels) {
00249                 delete[] avg;
00250                 avg=0;
00251         }
00252         avgChannels = hdr->avgChannels;
00253         if (!avg) avg = new float[avgChannels*nbTri];
00254         if (size != serializeSize()) {
00255                 printf("problem!\n");
00256         }
00257         assert(size == serializeSize());
00258         memcpy(avg, buffer + sizeof(Hdr), nbTri*avgChannels*sizeof(float));
00259 }
00260 
00261 void LightCollector::invalidate()
00262 {
00263         if (avg) {
00264                 delete[] avg;
00265                 avg = 0;
00266         }
00267 }

00269 bool LightCollector::cmpWithRef(const LightCollector &ref, float *val, const float *_scale, const float *_shift)
00270 {
00271         if (avg==0) return false;
00272         assert(avgChannels==ref.avgChannels);
00273 
00274         const float ones[3] = {1,1,1};
00275         const float zeroes[3] = {0,0,0};
00276         const float *scale = (_scale ? _scale : ones);
00277         const float *shift = (_shift ? _shift : zeroes);
00278         vector<float> values[3];
00279 
00280         values[0].reserve(nbTri);
00281         values[1].reserve(nbTri);
00282         values[2].reserve(nbTri);
00283 
00284         for (int i=0; i<nbTri; i++) {
00285                 for (int c=0; c<avgChannels; c++) {
00286                         float v = avg[i*avgChannels+c];
00287                         float rv = ref.avg[i*avgChannels+c];
00288                         if (v>= 5 && v<=250 && rv >= 5 && rv <= 250) {
00289                                 values[c].push_back((scale[c]*v+shift[c])/rv);
00290                         }
00291                 }
00292         }
00293         for (int i=0; i<avgChannels; i++) {
00294                 if (values[i].size()>0) {
00295                         val[i] = values[i][values[i].size()/2];
00296                 } else {
00297                         return false;
00298                 }
00299         }
00300         return true;
00301 }
